DataMaskCustomValueLibrary.name: DataMaskCustomValueLibrary
DataMaskCustomValueLibrary.description: Represents a set of user-inputted values in a custom library in Data Mask.

ContentType.description: The type of value used in a field of the custom library.

Description.description: The description of the value in the custom library.

IsActive.description: Represents whether the library is active or inactive for use.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the custom library.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the custom library.

Type.description: Represents how the values were added to the library.

Values.description: The content of the value field for masking data.
